name: Polytomic
headline: No-code data syncing between your systems
description: Polytomic is a no-code web app to sync data between your internal databases, business systems (e.g. Stripe, Salesforce, etc), data warehouses, spreadsheets, and even HTTP APIs.
markdown:
raw_markdown="[](https://www.polytomic.com/</>)

## Bidirectional ETL and data syncing
[Book demo](https://www.polytomic.com/</book-demo>)
or
[Start free trial](https://www.polytomic.com/</start-free-trial>)
or
Trusted by Data and ops teams
![Brex](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037bae40b03e4a1bbb06f5_Brex-min.svg)
![CloudTrucks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037baf4c42b37e0fbac0a1_CloudTrucks-min.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/66f07d38b41f1d81718a9b8d_Retool.svg)
![Vanta](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037baedd1159a0c1fc4709_Vanta-min.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/66ebd7e824eaabe44e6322d1_Heygen.svg)
![ID.me logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65ee85a9e4f132cab4914829_IDMe.svg)
![Mercury](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037bae5786cce867364e28_Mercury-min.svg)
![Vercel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037bae8b1f86f497c26236_Vercel-min.svg)
![Artsy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037bafb40e5c8a04b09b86_Artsy-min.svg)
![Sourcegraph](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037bae3ad1dfdbb8f8f8b9_Sourcegraph-min.svg)
![Telnyx](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/65037bae7434b46058dda760_Telnyx-min.svg)
Unified Platform
### One platform for all syncs
ETL, ELT, CDC streaming, Reverse ETL, and general data syncs in one platform.Move data between data warehouses, databases, cloud applications, general storage, spreadsheets, and HTTP APIs.
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Download it [here](https://www.polytomic.com/<https:/www-polytomic-assets.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/personas/anywhere_etl.mp4>)
Enterprise
### Enterprise-ready
Polytomic is enterprise-ready out of the box.Self-hosted deployment option, RBAC permissions, audit log, no-code and code, and more.
![Self hosted ETL solution.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/630409f536fae0d423bba7ba_server%20icon.svg)
Self-hosted option available
Deploy Polytomic to your private cloud
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/66f2fc969ed78b266aff2c00_B.svg)
Security and compliance
SOC 2, GDPR, CCPA, and HIPAA compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/66f2fc96061678aaa9cc2fba_C.svg)
Enterprise permissions engine
True RBAC fine-grained user permissions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/66f2fc9612bdedb34bbcd9a6_D.svg)
Infrastructure as code option
Run Polytomic with Terraform or code
Integrations
### Integrations ready
Two-way integrations available out of the box. Your integration requests built in days.
![Snowflake logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/62eba7fe62bac06e1f31f7e7_Integration%3DSnowflake.svg)

BigQuery

![Stripe logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/662686d9be3408abe47038d4_stripe.svg)
Stripe

NetSuite

Google Sheets

HubSpot

LinkedIn Ads
![Airtable logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/62eba7feb31a6d8cfc8c5065_Integration%3DAirtable.svg)
Airtable
And many more...
Support
### Fanatical customer support
Replies to your messages in under a minute.
![G2 support badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/66267b7b427daadf85d022cb_best-support.svg)
or
[Book demo](https://www.polytomic.com/</book-demo>)
or
[Start free trial](https://www.polytomic.com/</start-free-trial>)
## All the features you need, on the platform that does it all
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622b80eec4382052d8485ea_stack.svg)
#### Replace multiple vendors
Reduce costs and simplify workflows
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622b9ded6e3bc292ef3ce2b_rotate.svg)
#### One platform for all syncs
ETL, Reverse ETL, CDC, iPaaS, APIs, and spreadsheets
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622b80e0008d2a556545a50_grid.svg)
#### Sync only whatâ€™s changed
Save on API limits and compute costs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622b80e28226ec8287c7ac7_click.svg)
#### Point and click
Select and filter your data without writing code
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622b80e4aa24876fdb2cde7_terminal.svg)
#### SQL query support
Powerful transformations when you need them
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622b80eee57629e308fb9bf_orbit.svg)
#### Pull from any API
No more glue code for custom integrations
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622b80ef4d67f032153a0ba_server.svg)
#### Self-hosting available
Turnkey deployment to your private cloud
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62eb5e6ae107875bf1582276/6622ba2450c42b5d99a1a404_shield.svg)
#### Enterprise-ready
SOC 2, GDPR, permissions, and audit logs

generated_description:
**Polytomic: Simplifying Data Syncing Without Code**

Founded in 2019 and a proud Y Combinator Batch W20 member, Polytomic is a San Francisco-based company on a mission to eliminate the cumbersome process of data synchronization among various systems. With a small but mighty team of seven, Polytomic offers a no-code web app that seamlessly syncs data across internal databases, business systems like Stripe and Salesforce, data warehouses, spreadsheets, and even HTTP APIs.

### What They Do
Polytomicâ€™s platform enables users to engage in bidirectional ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) and general data syncingâ€”all without writing a single line of code. Itâ€™s designed to cater to data teams, marketing operations (RevOps), and support teams, streamlining how businesses handle their data.

Their core offerings include:
- **No-Code Syncing and ETL**: A straightforward way to manage data workflows without technical barriers.
- **Polytomic Connect**: An API to facilitate sync and ETL processes.
  
By combining ETL, Reverse ETL, CDC streaming, and more into a unified platform, Polytomic allows organizations to move data effortlessly between various channels including data warehouses, cloud applications, and spreadsheets.

### Features and Integrations
Polytomic stands out with its ease of useâ€”point-and-click data filtering, SQL query support for transformations, and ready-made two-way integrations that can be set up in days. They support a wide range of integrations including popular services like Snowflake, Salesforce, Google Sheets, and Stripe, among others.

Concerned about security? Polytomic is enterprise-ready, boasting compliance with standards like SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA. The platform also offers features like role-based access controls (RBAC) and auditing logs, ensuring that data management adheres to strict security protocols.

### Customer Support
Polytomic prides itself on its customer support, promising replies in under a minute. They aim to resolve inquiries swiftly, allowing users to focus on what truly mattersâ€”using their data effectively.

### Who They Serve
Polytomicâ€™s solutions are tailored for various sectors including data teams, marketing, and support groups, helping them streamline data management without compromising flexibility or control.

Interested in seeing it in action? You can visit their website to book a demo or try a free trial for 14 days. 

In summary, Polytomic is a breath of fresh air in the world of data engineering. By leveraging no-code solutions, they empower businesses to harness the power of their data efficiently and effectively. If you're tired of wrestling with data integrations, Polytomic just might be the solution you're looking for.

**Website**: [Polytomic.com](https://www.polytomic.com)
